sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>woman</radical> sleeps with the <radical>king</radical> and becomes <kanji>pregnant</kanji>. Only the king wasn’t human and now the woman is pregnant with a hybrid alien baby!
meaningInfo: The king radical is slightly altered in this kanji, so just remember that the king is a strange alien and not human. Imagine being this woman and having this half-breed alien baby inside you. Feels weird.
readingMnemonic: Being <kanji>pregnant</kanji> with this strange creature, you need to do something to calm you down. You should play <reading>Nin</reading>tendo (<ja>にん</ja>). Nintendo really calms your nerves and makes being pregnant with some mutant baby not seem like that big of a deal anymore.
readingInfo: What game are you playing on the Nintendo? Maybe it’s a game where you kill alien invaders? That’s messed up.
